additional_packages.title: yay
additional_packages.description: Yay is an AUR helper written in Go, designed to make it easier to install and manage packages from the Arch User Repository (AUR).

additional_packages.title: Visual Studio Code
additional_packages.description: A powerful code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.

additional_packages.title: Brave Browser
additional_packages.description: Brave is a free and open-source web browser developed by Brave Software, Inc. It is based on the Chromium web browser and focuses on privacy and speed.

additional_packages.title: Firefox
additional_packages.description: Firefox is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation. It is designed for speed, privacy, and user control.

additional_packages.title: Google Chrome
additional_packages.description: Google Chrome is a cross-platform web browser developed by Google. It is designed to be fast, simple, and secure, with a minimalistic user interface.

additional_packages.title: Opera
additional_packages.description: Opera is a web browser developed by Opera Software. It is known for its speed, security features, and innovative user interface.

additional_packages.title: Vivaldi
additional_packages.description: Vivaldi is a free and open-source web browser developed by Vivaldi Technologies. It is designed for power users and offers extensive customization options, built-in tools, and a focus on user privacy.

additional_packages.title: Discord
additional_packages.description: Discord is a VoIP, instant messaging and digital distribution platform designed for creating communities.

additional_packages.title: Steam
additional_packages.description: Steam is a digital distribution platform developed by Valve Corporation for purchasing and playing video games.

additional_packages.title: Libre Office
additional_packages.description: LibreOffice is a free and open-source office suite, developed by The Document Foundation, that includes applications for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, and more.

additional_packages.title: WPS Office
additional_packages.description: WPS Office is a free and cross-platform office suite developed by Kingsoft, which includes a word processor, spreadsheet, and presentation software.

additional_packages.title: Inkscape
additional_packages.description: Inkscape is a free and open-source vector graphics editor used for creating and editing vector images, including illustrations, diagrams, and complex paintings.

additional_packages.title: GIMP
additional_packages.description: GIMP (GNU Image Manipulation Program) is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for tasks such as photo retouching, image editing, and image composition.

additional_packages.title: VLC
additional_packages.description: VLC media player is a free and open-source, cross-platform media player and streaming media server developed by the VideoLAN project. It supports most multimedia files, as well as DVDs, audio CDs, VCDs, and various streaming protocols.

additional_packages.title: Reaper
additional_packages.description: Reaper is a digital audio workstation (DAW) software application for Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux. It is used for recording, editing, mixing, and processing audio and MIDI.
